#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<map>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<string.h>
#include<string>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<fstream>
#include<set>
#include<sstream>

using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
ll dp[10005][8];
const ll mod = 10000007;
ll ret(ll run,ll ball)
{
	 if(run<=0)
	 return 1;
	 if(ball<=0)
	 return 1;
	 
	 if(dp[run][ball]!=-1)
	 return dp[run][ball];
	 ll ans = 0;
	 ans += ret(run,ball-1);
	 ans += ret(run-1,ball-1);
	 ans += ret(run-2,ball-1);
	 ans += ret(run-3,ball-1);
	 ans += ret(run-4,ball-1);
	 ans += ret(run-6,ball-1);
	 
	 
	 ans += ret(run-1,ball);
	 ans += ret(run-2,ball);
	 ans += ret(run-3,ball);
	 ans += ret(run-5,ball);
	 ans += ret(run-1,ball);
	 ans += ret(run-2,ball);
	 ans += ret(run-5,ball);
	 ans += ret(run-7,ball);
	 ans += ret(run,ball-1);
	 //cout<<ans<<endl;
	ans++;
	 dp[run][ball] = ans%mod;
}
int main()
{
	memset(dp,-1,sizeof dp);
	ll tcase,t,n;
    ret(10003,6);
	scanf("%lld",&tcase);
	for(t=1;t<=tcase;t++)
	{
		 scanf("%lld",&n);
		 printf("Case %lld: %lld\n",t,dp[n][6]);
	}
	
}
